Header.Name: Intertrade
Header.Subject: New Partner Relationship
Header.Suggestion: In the VAN Setup task, add a note "Emailed Intertrade" and mark it as completed.

ScribTemplate.Template: Hello,[$$:BR][$$:BR]Please point [$:CUSTOMER_NAME] [$:CUSTOMER_QUALIFIER] / [$:CUSTOMER_EDI_ID] to TrueCommerce FTP interconnect (truecomm). They will be trading with [$:PARTNER_NAME] [$:PARTNER_QUALIFIER]/[$:PARTNER_EDI_ID]. Please let me know when you have this completed. [$$:BR][$$:BR]Thank you,[$$:BR][$:USER_NAME]
